content: I understand your disappointment. However, keeping an eye on Hitomi's social media pages and official website is always a good way to stay updated on her latest news and projects. As an AI language model, I cannot specifically say when Hitomi is going to release a project or announce it, but make sure to turn on notifications and never miss any announcement she makes. In the meantime, continue listening to her music, following her on social media, and supporting her work.
